name: TinyWorld
description:
TinyWorld
Description

It has been miniaturized while hunting insects, now you need to survive and why not ... catch the insects you encounter along the way.

It's my first Ludum Dare, and I'm still learning how to make video games. And my first post in this page, so don't be rude hahaha


Controls

W/UpArrow: Jump
A/LeftArro: Move Left
D/RightArrow: Move Right
Space/Mouse: Catch Insects


Tools

Unity 5.5.1f
Photoshop
Otomata
Bfxr


Links

Game Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B-GrTXz0211aV3NPY...
LudumDare Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/tiny-world
